name: $taskname$
friendlyName: Run Azure RM TTK Tests (Cross Platform) $taskdisplayname$
description: Run Azure Resource Manager Template Test Kit Tests against ARM & Bicep Templates
author: Sam Cogan
instanceNameFormat: Run Azure RM TTK Tests (Cross Platform)

inputs.name: templatelocation
inputs.label: Template Folder or Template
inputs.helpMarkDown: Folder containing templates, or individual template to test

inputs.name: recurse
inputs.label: Recurse Template Location
inputs.helpMarkDown: Recurse through all folders underneath template location

inputs.name: includeTests
inputs.label: Tests to Include
inputs.helpMarkDown: Comma separated list of specific test to run, leave blank to run all tests.

inputs.name: skipTests
inputs.label: Tests to Skip
inputs.helpMarkDown: Comma separated list of specific test to skip, leave blank to run all tests.

inputs.name: mainTemplates
inputs.label: Main Templates List
inputs.helpMarkDown: Comma separated list of templates to be marked as a 'main' template for the purposes of tests such as location hardcoding, leave blank to not mark any templates or rely on naming convention

inputs.name: allTemplatesMain
inputs.label: Treat All Templates as Main Templates
inputs.helpMarkDown: Treat all templates as 'main' templates for the purpose of tests such as location hardcoding

inputs.name: cliOutputResults
inputs.label: Output Summary Results in CLI
inputs.helpMarkDown: Whether to provide summary results of tests in the Azure Devops Console

inputs.name: ignoreExitCode
inputs.label: Do not fail task on failed tests
inputs.helpMarkDown: Ignore Exit Code and do not fail task when there are failed tests

inputs.name: usePSCore
inputs.label: Use PowerShell Core (Windows Only)
inputs.helpMarkDown: On a Windows agent, if set will run Pester tests with 'pwsh', if false will use 'PowerShell.exe'. On Non-Windows agents 'pwsh' always used

inputs.name: useAzBicep
inputs.label: Use Az CLI version of Bicep (az bicep)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Use the Azure CLI version of Bicep for transpiling Bicep files (az bicep command). This requires the Azure CLI to be present on the machine and bicep installed using this CLI

inputs.name: azureServiceConnection
inputs.label: Azure Service Connection (optional)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional service connection to connect to Azure before running tests. Only required if you need to connect to a Bicep Module repository or ARM Template Specs
